title: giridhara nAthA sharaNam
sahitya:
giridhara nAthA sharaNam emmaik-kEDinrik-kAppAi ittaruNam jaya


anupallavi

  parama sukhAnandap-poruLE nalla bhaktaraip-pAlittiDum tiruvaruLE


caraNam    nErukku nErAga varuvAi en nenjinukk-Arudal taruvAi Urukkum bhayamillai 
uravukkum bhayamillai pArukkum bhayamillai pOrukkum bhayamillai
